Title: Simple WMV/ASF files muxer/demuxer
Description: Simple WMV files muxer/demuxer implemented in C#/C++. It has simple WPF-based UI and allows copy/replace operations on video, audio and script streams (including scripts stored in a header). Could be used to mux wmv files with embedded scripts (Chessbase videos, for example).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple WMV files muxer/demuxer implemented in C#/C++. It has simple WPF-based UI and allows copy/replace operations on video, audio and script streams (including scripts stored in a header). Could be used to mux wmv files with embedded scripts (Chessbase videos, for example).
